asset.author: TheBlaze
asset.hookText:
Don't miss the new episode debuting Wednesday February 12, 2014 at 8pm ET: http://TheBlaze.com/TV.

The day of November 5, 2009 started off like many others at Fort Hood, but that all changed when Nidal Hasan opened fire at the Soldier Readiness Processing Center, killing 14 people including an unborn baby. Some of the survivors of that attack shared their incredible stories with For The Record, providing a glimpse inside those moments of terror.
